9251.title: Users will be notified through some method of changes to the Terms of Use

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
tosdr.tldr:
The Terms of Use state, "We are constantly trying to improve our Services, so these Terms may need to change along with our Services. We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time, but if we do, we will place a notice on the https://www.sololearn.com/ site, send you an email, and/or notify you by some other means."

This indicates that one will learn about changes, but does not state what timeframe the notification will occur within.

9252.title: You can decline updates to the Terms of Use if you agree to stop using the service.

tosdr.case: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "If you donâ€™t agree with the new Terms, you are free to reject them; unfortunately, that means you will no longer be able to use the Services.  If you use the Services in any way after a change to the Terms is effective, that means you agree to all of the changes." This shows that you do not automatically agree to new terms. However, continued use of the service implies acceptance.
